Title: Sprite Sheet Editor
Description: Using Sprite Sheet Editor, any 2D game developer or designer can define rectangular frames of animation for a game sprite using the editor and save them in an open, human readable, easy-to-access XML format.  Requires .NET Framework 3.5
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Using Sprite Sheet Editor, any 2D game developer or designer can define rectangular frames of animation for a game sprite using the editor and save them in an open, human readable, easy-to-access XML format. Requires .NET Framework 3.5
